Package doa.engine.core

Enum DoaRenderingMode

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<DoaRenderingMode>
doa.engine.core.DoaRenderingMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DoaRenderingMode>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum DoaRenderingMode
extends java.lang.Enum<DoaRenderingMode>
Specifies the rendering mode of DoaEngine. If DoaEngine's rendering mode is set, the rendering will take place prioritizing the selected protocol. Else, the rendering will take place balancing speed and quality a.k.a. BALANCED.
Since:
DoaEngine 1.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    java.lang.Enum.EnumDesc<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant Description
    BALANCED
    Balance out quality and performance:

    Balanced ALPHA INTERPOLATION QUALITY ANTIALIASING ON COLOR RENDERING QUALITY DITHERING DISABLED FRACTIONALMETRICS OFF INTERPOLATION BILINEAR RENDERING QUALITY STROKE CONTROL PURE TEXT ANTIALIASING ON
    CUSTOM
    Set DoaEngineSettings.RENDERING_MODE to CUSTOM for this to be useful.
    QUALITY
    Maximize quality at the cost of performance:

    Quality ALPHA INTERPOLATION QUALITY ANTIALIASING ON COLOR RENDERING QUALITY DITHERING ENABLED FRACTIONALMETRICS ON INTERPOLATION BICUBIC RENDERING QUALITY STROKE CONTROL NORMALIZE TEXT ANTIALIASING ON
    SPEED
    Maximize performance at the cost of quality:

    Speed ALPHA INTERPOLATION SPEED ANTIALIASING OFF COLOR RENDERING SPEED DITHERING DISABLED FRACTIONALMETRICS OFF INTERPOLATION NEAREST NEIGHBOR RENDERING SPEED STROKE CONTROL PURE TEXT ANTIALIASING OFF
